DepartmentResponse.description: Default response dto for a department

MessageResponse.description: A response contianer when just a message have to be returned

field.description: Name of the property which caused the conflict

message.description: Message about the reason/background of the conflict

ValidationFailedResponse.description:
Represents the summary of all validation errors
Data-Format that will be returned after a failed validation

ValidationError.description: Represents a validation error, occured when validating an incoming model

message.description: Error message, which explains that something went wrong

departmentId.description: Id of the department which the employee should be added to

employeeId.description: Id of the employee which should be added to the department

departmentId.description: Id of the department which the employee should be removed from

employeeId.description: Id of the employee which should be removed from the department

EmployeeResponse.description: Default response dto for an employee

EmployeeDepartmentResponse.description: Default response dto for a department from an employee

EmployeeRoleResponse.description: Default response dto for a role from an employee

current-password.description: The current plain password of the employee, can be null  if a password change shouldn't be performed

new-password.description: The new plain password from the employee, can be null if password change shouldn't be performed

TokenResponse.description: Response after an employee is logged in

ProductResponse.description: Default response dto for a product

serialNumber.description: Serialnumber to match the new id to the product

ProductTypeResponse.description: Default response dto for a product type

childIds.description: All ids from the entities related as children to this product type

parentIds.description: All ids from the entities related as paretns to this product type
Collection with all ids of all parent product types

childIds.description: Collection with all ids of all the child product types

productTypeId.description: Id of the created product type

children.description: All first level children of the product type

parentIds.description: Ids of the new parents product types

baseId.description: Id of the product type which the parents product types should be added to

childIds.description: Ids from the new children for the product type

baseId.description: Id of the product type which the child product type should be added to

parentId.description: Id of the parent product type which should be removed

baseId.description: Id of the product type which the parent should be removed from

childIds.description: Ids of the children product types which should be removed

baseId.description: Id of the product type which the child should be removed from

RoleResponse.description: Default response dto for a role

roleId.description: Id of the new created role

roleIds.description: Ids of the roles which should be added to the employee

employeeId.description: Id of the employee which the role should be added to

roleId.description: Id of the role which should be added to the department

departmentId.description: Id of the department to role should be added to

roleIds.description: Ids of the roles which should be removed from the employee

employeeId.description: Id of the employee which the role should be removed from

roleId.description: Id of the role which should be removed from the department

departmentId.description: Id of the department to role should be removed from

WarehouseResponse.description: Default response dto for a warehouse

WarehouseShelfResponse.description: Response dto for shelf data inside a request targeting the warehouse controller

designation.description: Designation of the shelf e.g. shelf 7A

WarehouseAddressResponse.description: Response dto for adress data inside a request targeting the warehouse controller

street.description: The street name without the house-number

housenumber.description: The housenumber , can be null if non existing

WarehouseCompartmentResponse.description: Response dto for compartment data inside a request targeting the warehouse controller

row.description: The row number inside the compartment grid

column.description: The column number inside the compartment grid

WarehouseCityResponse.description: Response dto for city data inside a request targeting the warehouse controller

WarehouseCountryResponse.description: Response dto for country data inside a request targeting the warehouse controller

abbrevation.description:
The abbrevation of the country e.g. Switzerland => CHE
Three digit country codes

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Please insert JWT with Bearer into field. Example: "bearer {token}"
